headline: "Shenzhen Port Operations Slowed After Flood Damage to Transport Infrastructure"
description: "Flood-related damage to road and rail links near Shenzhen port has slowed container movement, leading to congestion and export backlogs. Logistics operators warn that shipment delays may continue."

headline: "Strong Earthquake Strikes Northwestern Turkey, Disrupting Automotive Supply Chains"
description: "A magnitude 6.4 earthquake struck Turkeyâ€™s Marmara region, damaging industrial facilities and halting production in multiple automotive manufacturing plants."

headline: "Port Workers Strike in Bangladesh Causes Export Delays"
description: "A strike by port workers in Dhaka and Chittagong has caused significant congestion at cargo terminals, delaying textile exports."
